supercell_matrix_shape.description: The shape of the supercell transformation matrix through using `get_sc_fromstruct' method. The format is a tuple.

matched_supercell_matrix_shape.description: The shape of the matched supercell transformation matrix through using `get_matched_structure_mapping' method. The format is a tuple.

supercell_lattice_parameters_consistency.description: The consistency of lattice constants between two supercells generated from different pymatgen methods (`get_sc_fromstruct' and `get_matched_structure_mapping'). The format is a boolean indicating if the lattice constants are consistent.
